item.description:
﻿So it will be high-tide at this time, but I've read that there should still be 150 feet of beach width even during high tide...so let's grab a pre-work sunrise walk at the beach!  We'll walk from 5:30-7 AM along the sandy beach, and typically do a 3.5-4 mile per hour pace...so by some standards a quick pace.  I'm bringing my dog...although (fyi to other dog owners that may bring their friendly pooch along) they're not allowed at the beach, but at that hour I don't anticipate an issue.  All dog owners are responsible for their own dogs. 

Please note the $1 meetup fee to help Angela pay for our group site.
item.how_to_find_us: See Maureen's comments in meetup comment section for more details- this is the main beach in Hampton Beach

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Hampton Beach (the big beach)- sunrise walk before work
